sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card class="mt-5 elevation-24 rounded-xl mx-auto d-flex justify-center" :style="`width: 75vw;border: 1px solid black; background-color:${$vuetify.theme.themes.light.background}`">
    <v-carousel
        continuous
        cycle
        interval="5000"
        hide-delimiter-background
        delimiter-icon="mdi-guitar-pick"
        show-arrows-on-hover
        height="58vh"
        class="rounded-xl"
    >
      <v-carousel-item
          class="rounded-xl"
          v-for="(slide, i) in slides"
          :key="i"
          :src="slide"
      >
      </v-carousel-item>

    </v-carousel>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "TheIndexViewCarousel",
  data: () => ({
    colors: [
      'green',
      'secondary',
      'yellow darken-4',
      'red lighten-2',
      'orange darken-1',
    ],
    labels: [
        "nu-metal",
        "old-school"
    ],
        slides: [
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_metallica.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_slipknot.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_lamb_of_god.png"),
          require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel.png")
    ],
  }),
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
